item.title: How to make the most of our data?
item.description: AirBnB particpated to the recent R user conference in NYC in May 2017. The video posted here and this blog post presents 3 important principles: Develop packages to mainstream analysis workflow. Promote education & contributions within the organisation Ensure reproducibility.
